articles.title: Huawei announces its phone with a pop-up selfie camera
articles.summary: Uber launched a new service in Denver, Colorado, selling train and bus tickets through its app and has sold over 1,200 tickets. Huawei is planning a product launch on May 7 in Dubai and has unveiled the Mate XT, a tri-fold smartphone.

articles.title: Shoppers are 'converted' by miracle dry shampoo that refreshes hair 'for days'
articles.author: Erica Carter
articles.summary: K18 has launched AirWash™ Dry Shampoo, a non-aerosol dry shampoo designed to eliminate odors and reduce oil without leaving residue. The product features translucent, porous mineral microbeads and odorBIND™ smart-release biotechnology, offering a subtle fragrance suitable for all hair types. Reviews suggest it effectively refreshes hair, providing volume and a clean scent for up to three days.

articles.title: Don't want a Tesla Model Y? Try these instead
articles.author: William Stopford
articles.summary: Several companies are introducing or updating their vehicles. Tesla Model Y has an updated model arriving soon. BYD's Sealion 7 is presented as a strong competitor in the electric SUV market, and Cupra is launching an updated Formentor with extended electric range. Kia also offers an appealing electric SUV called EV5.

articles.title: Yehuda Levi and Pelephone in a new trade-in campaign
articles.author: Yehuda Levi
articles.summary: Pelephone is launching a new campaign featuring trade-in offers starting at NIS 1,999 for the Samsung Galaxy S25, which is officially launching in Israel today. The campaign aims to provide a cost-effective solution for Israelis looking to purchase a new smartphone, and Pelephone is also offering a 5-year warranty for Samsung's new flagship devices.

articles.title: Tattoos, they're much more than just skin-deep
articles.author: ET Bureau
articles.summary: A leading soap brand featured a model with a semicolon tattoo in a recent advertisement. This marketing choice signals the brand's intent to embrace diverse consumers, including those with tattoos, and aims to connect with millennials by incorporating modern cultural symbols. The ad campaign reflects a shift in brand messaging to align with contemporary social trends.

articles.title: We Tried 10 Popular Coffee Brands To Find Out Which Works Best For An Espresso Machine
articles.author: Mary K. Cahill
articles.summary: Happy coffee co-owned by Robert Downey Jr. and Craig Dubitsky launched "Happy Dazzling Dark Roast" in January 2024, which is smooth and well-balanced; La Colombe's "Corsica Darker Roast" sourced from Brazil, Colombia, Honduras, and Mexico worked wonderfully with a robust taste; Trader Joe's "French Roast", a dark roast, is strong and rich, and has a bitter edge.

articles.title: Just in time for winter: Restorative and vegan lip mask
articles.summary: Dr. Marina Landau's MAHUT series has launched LIP BALM TMSUPCERAT, a nourishing lip mask designed to restore and support moisture retention. The lip balm is formulated with TMSUPCERAT, a complex of ceramides, antioxidants, and peptides, alongside ingredients such as grape seed oil, shea butter, and cocoa butter. Clinical trials demonstrated that the TMSUPCERAT complex boosts hyaluronic acid, epidermal lipids, and claudin-1 enzyme production while inhibiting collagen and elastin breakdown.

articles.title: 33 Nifty TikTok Products You Probably Haven't Seen Yet
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Kuumba Made introduced Vanilla Bean and Golden Sky fragrance roll-ons, available on Amazon. Olay launched Super Serum Body Wash, packed with niacinamide, shea butter, and collagen peptides also available on Amazon. Ninja launched portable Crispi Air Fryer system with PowerPod with different modes such as Max Crisp, Bake, Air Fry, and Recrisp, also available on Amazon.

articles.title: Dollar General Celebrates North Little Rock, Arkansas Distribution Center Grand Opening
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Dollar General celebrated the grand opening of its new distribution center in North Little Rock, Arkansas. This facility enhances the company's distribution capabilities and supports stores in the region. Dollar General also donated to the Arkansas Food Bank to support food security.

articles.title: Currys launches raunchy sex toy range that even livens up your commute to work
articles.author: Ross Kaniuk
articles.summary: Currys has launched a new 'wellness' technology range featuring sex fun devices like 'Massage Wands' and 'Pleasure Stimulators'. The range, available online, includes items like a remote-controlled egg, a Pleasure Cup, and a massage wand, designed to positively impact intimacy and self-care.

articles.title: Is this a Galaxy S25 Edge in the wild?
articles.author: Wes Davis
articles.summary: YouTuber Alexis Garza demonstrated the unreleased Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge, an ultra-slim phone. The purported specs include 12GB RAM, a 4,000mAh battery, and dual 12MP rear cameras.

articles.title: The best smartphone you can buy for under $500
articles.author: Allison Johnson
articles.summary: Apple is launching the iPhone 16E on February 28th as a successor to the iPhone SE, featuring USB-C, Face ID, and Apple Intelligence. Google's Pixel 8A is available for $500, with rumors of the Pixel 9A arriving on March 26th, starting at $499 with 128GB of storage. OnePlus offers the 12R with a large screen and fast charging, while Samsung's Galaxy A35 5G provides strong specs and water resistance for $399.

articles.title: The rise of browser-use agents: Why Convergence's Proxy is beating OpenAI's Operator
articles.summary: OpenAI's Operator and Convergence's Proxy are introducing AI-powered browser-use agents that autonomously navigate websites and complete transactions. While OpenAI requires a $200 monthly ChatGPT Pro subscription to access Operator, Convergence offers limited free use and a $20/month unlimited plan for Proxy, impacting enterprise adoption with competitive pricing.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold7 has a new S Pen pen.
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Samsung is planning to launch a redesigned S Pen, potentially bundled with the upcoming Galaxy Z Fold7. The new S Pen features a refined tip and a noticeably thicker profile, possibly for ergonomic enhancements or new functionalities. This launch signals Samsung's ongoing commitment to enhancing the foldable device experience through stylus integration.

articles.title: New Tesla Model Y Test Drive With FSD 13: Getting Closer To Waymo?
articles.summary: The article discusses a test drive of the new Tesla Model Y equipped with FSD v13 in Los Angeles, comparing its performance to Waymo's driverless taxis. The updated Model Y features a facelift mirroring the Model 3 and improvements in cabin noise and handling. Tesla's Unsupervised FSD, a driverless robotaxi, is planned to launch in Austin, Texas, in June.

articles.title: The rise of browser-use agents: Why Convergence's Proxy is beating OpenAI's Operator
articles.author: News Feed Editor
articles.summary: A new generation of AI-powered browser-use agents is emerging, promising to automate web interactions.  Operator and Proxy are consumer-friendly examples, while Browser Use, a Y-Combinator startup, allows users to customize agent models. These tools aim to streamline tasks such as information retrieval and transactions on the web.

articles.title: "With standard specifications and competitive price" Mobile Vivo v5
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Vivo has launched the Vivo V50, a flagship smartphone featuring the Qualcomm Snapdragon 7 Gen 3 processor, a 6.77-inch FHD+ AMOLED display with Diamond Shield glass, a 50MP front camera, and a rear dual-camera setup with 50MP primary and secondary sensors. The phone also comes with a 5000mAh battery for extended use.

articles.title: CHAUDHRI: Calling on Canadian entrepreneurs
articles.author: Sunira Chaudhri
articles.summary: Monica Nassif launched Caldrea, an upscale cleaning product business, in 1999. Anticipating competition, she later launched Mrs. Meyers, a more reasonably priced cleaning suite of products, with Restoration Hardware and Whole Foods as early clients.

articles.title: CHAUDHRI: Calling on Canadian entrepreneurs
articles.author: Sunira Chaudhri
articles.summary: Monica Nassif launched Mrs. Meyers cleaning products, a more reasonably priced line, after developing it for several months. Restoration Hardware was her first client around 2002, followed by successful launches in Whole Foods locations across America. The brand achieved close to $30 million in revenue by 2007 before being sold to S.E. Johnson for global distribution.

articles.title: US firm's new humanoid robot NEO Gamma serves coffee, cleans house
articles.author: Prabhat Ranjan Mishra
articles.summary: The company introduces the NEO Gamma robot featuring soft covers for safety and a visual manipulation model for object interaction. NEO Gamma also integrates a new in-house language model for natural conversation and body language, leading to internal home testing.

articles.title: The start menu has a facelift with an obvious iPhone inspiration
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Microsoft is introducing a revamped Windows 11 Start menu with a modern grid view for apps, category-based organization similar to iOS, and enhanced mobile integration for Android devices. The update includes a sidebar for notifications and a quick sharing function. The rollout will begin with Windows 11 versions 22H2 and 23H2, with early access available through the Windows Insider program.

articles.title: How helpful is Operator, OpenAI's new AI agent?
articles.author: Denver Post
articles.summary: OpenAI's Operator service has been demonstrated to order a new ice cream scoop on Amazon and configure domain name settings. The service also booked a Valentine's Day date.

articles.title: Dyson's new Red Velvet and Gold Supersonic Nural hair dryer is on sale for $100 within a month of its launch
articles.author: Danielle Halibey
articles.summary: Dyson launched a new colorway for its Supersonic Nural Hair Dryer called Red Velvet and Gold in February. This version includes features like Scalp Protect Mode, Attachment Learning which automatically adjusts the settings based on the attachments used, and Pause Detect which deactivates the heater and airflow when the dryer is put down.

articles.title: Lenovo Legion Go S review: feels good, plays bad
articles.author: Sean Hollister
articles.summary: Lenovo's Legion Go S, a new handheld gaming PC, is reviewed against the Steam Deck OLED and the original Legion Go. Priced at $730 for the Windows version, the Legion Go S features an AMD Z2 Go chip, with claims of an upcoming SteamOS version at $499. While the Legion Go S has some improvements, its Z2 Go chip underperforms compared to the Steam Deck, impacting gaming performance and battery life, leading to a recommendation against the Windows version.

articles.title: The Dyson V8 Absolute vacuum is almost $200 off right now
articles.author: Josie Howell
articles.summary: Dyson is offering a $170 discount on the Dyson V8 Absolute stick vacuum, bringing the price down to $349.99. The V8 Absolute features two cleaner heads, one for hard floors and one for carpets, and a fully sealed filtration system. It also has a maximum run time of up to 40 minutes.

articles.title: Amazon knocks 30% off 'amazing' mattress topper that shoppers say is like 'sleeping on a cloud'
articles.author: Eilidh Farquhar
articles.summary: Amazon has reduced the price of the Mightysoft Mattress Topper, with the double size now available for £33.99. Several other mattress toppers are mentioned, including the ACRALI HOME Thick Mattress Topper retailing for £32.99 and the Teddy Mattress Topper available for £11 at Dunelm.

articles.title: How helpful is Operator, OpenAI's new AI agent?
articles.summary: OpenAI introduced Operator, an AI agent, as a 'research preview' for ChatGPT Pro subscribers at $200 per month. This agent can autonomously perform tasks like ordering items online, booking appointments, and managing online accounts, but it has limitations and requires user oversight. While currently not a must-have product, Operator demonstrates the potential of AI agents.

articles.title: Next's new £59 midi dress that's 'perfect for beachwear and days out'
articles.author: Zoe Chamberlain
articles.summary: Next has introduced a new summer dress featuring a V-shape neckline and ruched front, available in yellow, black, and white (though white is currently out of stock). Priced at £59, the dress is available in sizes eight to 24, with petite and regular lengths.

articles.title: Running on Ice: Last-mile ice cream solutions and Dolly Parton in the freezer
articles.author: Freight Waves
articles.summary: Conagra Brands partnered with Dolly Parton. They aim to solidify their presence in existing categories. They also plan to enter new markets such as Southern cooking and comfort food.

articles.title: The Best Top Load Washers of 2025: Reviewed
articles.author: Israel Hayom Shopping Team
articles.summary: The article features several top load washers highlighting their features, efficiency, and performance. One model boasts a 3.0 cu. ft. capacity with transparent top and stainless steel tub. Another has a 4.1 cu. ft. capacity, MaxFill feature, and 12 wash cycles including Quick Wash, Delicate, and Active Wear.

articles.title: All PCs will be AI PCs "pretty soon," says Intel exec
articles.summary: Intel's Ultra Core processors feature CPUs, GPUs, and NPUs, enhancing PC performance for AI tasks. Microsoft Copilot+ PCs and laptops with Snapdragon X Elite chips exemplify this new category, offering benefits like enhanced privacy and cost efficiency by running AI models locally. This new technology is making new computers more efficient for running AI on devices, reducing energy costs and improving customer experiences.

articles.title: Meet Richest Man In UP: Once Sold Soap And Detergent On Bicycle, He Is The Mind Behind Iconic Ghadi Detergent—His Net Worth is Rs… Cr
articles.author: Zee Media Bureau
articles.summary: RSPL Group launched Ghari Detergent Powder and soap products in 1988. The company expanded its product line to include homecare items like hair oil, shampoo, hand wash, toothpaste, shaving cream, floor cleaner, and toilet cleaner. Amitabh Bachchan is the brand ambassador for Gharli Detergent.

articles.title: Amazon February devices event: what to expect
articles.author: Mike Prospero
articles.summary: Amazon is anticipated to launch a smarter, AI-powered version of Alexa on February 26th, following a long wait since its initial announcement. The event might also feature updates to Amazon's hardware lineup, including potential new generations of the Echo Dot and Amazon Echo devices.

articles.title: Greggs to open first Derry store
articles.author: Mark Robinson
articles.summary: Greggs is opening its first store in Derry, located in Foyleside Shopping Centre. The store will offer Greggs' signature sausage rolls, bakes, and pastries. The opening is expected in late spring or early summer following recruitment for manager and supervisor roles.

articles.title: Marks & Spencer's £45 'perfect summer getaway' dress shoppers are 'buying early in case it sells out'
articles.author: Zoe Chamberlain
articles.summary: Marks & Spencer (M&S) launched a new strappy midaxi summer dress priced at £45. Some shoppers praised the fit and fabric of the dress, while one customer expressed disappointment with the strap adjustability and transparency. Next also offers similar summer dresses.

articles.title: Asus Continues Fragrant Device Trend With an Aromatic Mouse
articles.summary: Asus introduced the Fragrance Mouse. The Fragrance Mouse features a removable container for fragrance oils.

articles.title: FIND: Whipped Soap + Scrub at Whole Foods
articles.author: Addy Bale
articles.summary: Pacha Soap Co. has made available a 'whipped soap + scrub' that the user has received.

articles.title: Olit Hookalit 40000: The Ultimate High-Capacity Vaping Experience
articles.author: Olit Vape Hookah Kit
articles.summary: The Olit 40000, a new disposable vape device, features a pre-filled 40ml e-juice reservoir, a rechargeable 1300mAh battery, and a lit mesh coil for enhanced flavor. Designed for both Mouth-To-Lung (MTL) and Direct-Lung (DL) vaping, it offers up to 40,000 puffs and includes a digital indicator screen for a user-friendly experience.

articles.title: 'I gave Samsung my old phone and saved £80 on my S25 bill' - shoppers could save £500
articles.author: Harriet Morphy-Morris
articles.summary: Samsung is offering trade-in discounts for the new Galaxy S25 series (S25, S25+, and S25 Ultra), allowing customers to receive up to £500 off depending on the model traded in. The offer, which is available until February 25, aims to provide competitive pricing against other smartphone launches. Initial user feedback suggests fast performance, but battery life may not meet expectations.

articles.title: BYD Sealion 7 crosses 1,000 booking milestone
articles.author: TOI.in
articles.summary: BYD launched its electric SUV, the Sealion 7, in India, achieving over 1,000 bookings. The base Premium variant starts at Rs 48.90 lakh, while the Performance variant costs Rs 54.90 lakh. Deliveries are scheduled to commence from March 7, 2025.

articles.title: Range Rover Sport: Giving it large
articles.author: Sean O'Grady
articles.summary: Jaguar Land Rover has introduced the latest Range Rover Sport, featuring a luxurious cabin, advanced technology, and a choice of powertrains, including plug-in hybrid (PHEV) and a twin-turbo V8 model. An all-electric battery-powered Range Rover Sport model is also planned for future release.

articles.title: Ninja Foodi crowned Amazon shoppers' most-wished for air fryer
articles.author: Kerri-Ann Roper
articles.summary: Ninja Foodi Dual Zone Digital Air Fryer, now priced at £149.00 on Amazon, features dual-zone technology for simultaneous cooking of two different foods. The air fryer offers roasting, air frying, reheating, and crisping functions with a 7.6L capacity and dishwasher-safe parts. The content mentions alternative options from Dunelm and Debenhams.

articles.title: 1X Neo Gamma: US-Based Humanoid Robot Startup Unveils Its Next Gen Model With Human-Like Movements (Watch Video)
articles.author: Kalpeshkumar Patelia
articles.summary: 1X, a US-based humanoid robot startup, has unveiled its new model, Neo Gamma, which features human-like walking, arm swinging, squatting ability, and improved environment predictability. Elon Musk's xAI also rolled out a new feature called Grok Powered Ads Creation, designed to help small businesses create advertisements on the X platform.

articles.title: A healthier choice? How juice vending machines like iJooz took over Singapore
articles.author: Cherie Lok
articles.summary: iJooz, Hale Smoothies and Fresh & Pure are expanding their vending machine businesses in Singapore, offering fresh juice and smoothies.  iJooz is rolling out a new version of its machine that will add pulp to its orange juice. Hale Smoothies, founded in 2022, plans to deploy 30 more machines by the end of 2025, and Fresh & Pure, launched in 2020, hopes to install a total of 500 machines by 2027.

articles.title: 'My Ninja portable blender is everything I never knew I needed'
articles.author: Lea Dzifa Seeberg What's On
articles.summary: Ninja has launched the Ninja Blast Portable Blender, a mini blender designed for making smoothies and protein shakes on the go. The blender features stainless steel blades for crushing ice and frozen fruit, a leak-proof lid, USB-C charging, and is available at various retailers like Amazon, Ninja, and Argos.

articles.title: Amazon funds second JA "educational incubator"
articles.author: Nbsp
articles.summary: Amazon Web Services, in partnership with Jonathan Alder Local Schools, has launched a Think Big Space at the school. The Think Big Space aims to foster creativity, problem-solving, and technical skills through hands-on learning in design, coding, robotics, artificial intelligence, and cloud computing.

articles.title: Why the Hong Kong market is important to mainland Chinese tech companies
articles.summary: JD.com launched JD Express for express deliveries between Hong Kong and mainland China in October. Taobao introduced free shipping for Hong Kong orders over 99 yuan in 2024. Keeta, a food delivery platform, also entered the Hong Kong market in 2023.

articles.title: Primark's comfy £7 pyjama bottoms shoppers say they'd wear them out
articles.author: Jodie Bradley
articles.summary: Primark has introduced new woven pyjama bottoms that are designed to be worn both as loungewear and as everyday wear. The pink and red striped bottoms, priced at £7, are marketed for their comfort and style versatility. Digital creator Jessica Joan Louise demonstrated how to pair the pyjamas with other clothing items for an elevated look.

articles.title: 10 Best NSFW AI Chat for Spicy AI Conversations
articles.author: Levitated Media
articles.summary: Several companies have launched or are offering NSFW AI Chatbot services. Candy.AI offers playful chats, erotic storytelling, and engaging flirting. SoulFun specializes in advanced roleplay with adaptive algorithms. GPT Girlfriend focuses on emotional bonding and intimate fantasies. Dittin AI provides highly personalized user sessions, Crushon AI offers kinky and taboo chats, and Privee AI includes voice chat options.

articles.title: Google Releases New Feature Boost To Millions Of iPhone Owners
articles.author: Janhoi McGregor
articles.summary: Google has announced the launch of 'Search Screen with Google Lens' for iOS, enabling users to use gestures for image searches within the Chrome app and other supporting apps. This update brings a similar experience to the Circle to Search AI feature on Samsung and Pixel devices, allowing direct image analysis without requiring screen captures. The feature aims to introduce Google AI to a broader audience, including iPhone users.

articles.title: The Oprah-Loved Ninja Creami Now Makes Soft Serve Ice Cream — Shop the New Gadget Ahead of Spring
articles.author: Clara Mcmahon
articles.summary: Ninja has launched the Ninja Swirl by Creami Ice Cream Maker, a new appliance capable of making soft serve ice cream, hard ice cream, frozen yogurt, and more. The new model includes 13 one-touch programs, featuring settings like Soft Serve, Fruit Whip, and Creami Fit.

articles.title: More New Tesla Model Y Arrive At Los Angeles Store Ahead Of Deliveries
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Tesla is preparing to deliver its newest car, the Model Y, with initial units arriving at a Los Angeles Tesla store. This suggests the imminent launch of the Model Y.

articles.title: Lil Nas X Teases New Single 'Hotbox': Fans React
articles.author: Billboard
articles.summary: Lil Nas X teased the release of his new single.

articles.title: Globe integrates AI to meet customers' evolving needs
articles.author: The Philippine Star
articles.summary: Globe Telecommunications Inc. is integrating Generative AI. This integration aims to streamline operations, optimize network performance, and improve customer service to better meet evolving customer needs.

articles.title: iPhone 16E: All the Features You Don't Get for $599
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: Apple introduced a new affordable phone. This phone includes premium features but omits some elements to maintain a sub-$600 price.

articles.title: These Healthy UAE-Made Ramen Cups Are 'More Than' Instant Noodles
articles.summary: Maya Sultan launched More.Than, a healthier instant noodle brand in Dubai, in October 2024. Unlike traditional instant noodles, More.Than is not pre-fried and contains whole-grain, high-protein, and less sodium. It is currently available in major retailers and Q-commerce platforms in Dubai.
